heading: ***WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY LATE TODAY INTO WEDNESDAY MORNING SOUTH OF THE ADIRONDACKS, THROUGH SOUTHERN VT, ALL OF NH, INTO MA***Today
text: Some periods of morning sun, then clouds returning. Milder. Highs in the upper 20s to low 30s, except mid to upper 30s southwest VT. Winds light, mainly southeast less than 10 mph.

heading: Tonight
text: Snow spreading east, mixed with sleet or rain south of Rt. 4, and through NY. Accumulations 1 to 4 inches, highest over the higher terrain north. Lows in the 20s, near 20 in spots northeast, rising into the upper 20s and 30s south late. Winds southeast 5 to 15 mph.

heading: Wednesday
text: Morning snow north, up to an additional inch. Some sleet west of the Green Mountains, and sleet, freezing rain, or rain south, tapering off. Highs from the low 30s north, to upper 30s south. Winds light, becoming west up to 10 mph.
